title: Did Johnson's 'New Deal' Hit The Mark?
itunes:title: Did Johnson's 'New Deal' Hit The Mark?
description:
Boris Johnson has promised a “Rooseveltian” approach to lifting the economy as he set out his vision for rebuilding Britain in a major speech in the West Midlands.

But Joey Jones, strategic counsel at Cicero AMO and former spokesperson for Theresa May, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing the prime minister's optimism is undermined by a surge of virus cases in Leicester.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
